title: Software Eng Intern

workDetails: Developing a tile-based scratch-off/pick-your-prize customer experience using <b>Svelte 5, Go, Protocol Buffers, Flowbite, and GitHub.<b>
Constructing the gamified experience to collect email/behavioral data, increasing conversion rates by 10% and strengthening data-driven brand-to-consumer connections.

title: Founder, Former President, & Web Dev
detail: Explore details about the club's history, schedule, FAQs, blog posts and more!
workDetails: Served as President of Northwestern’s music discourse club, led executive board, facilitated discussions on weekly music choices.

Built the <a href=`https://musictastingclub.com`> club's website using Typescript/React, GitHub Pages, and the MaterialUI library, to market the Music Tasting Club to Northwestern students, catalog previous album picks, answer members’ questions, detail executive board’s duties, and host articles.
